product_name: NUDESTIXNUDESKIN 5% Citrus Fruit & Glycolic Glow Toner
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackNUDESTIX NUDESKIN 5% Citrus Fruit & Glycolic Glow Toner has powered actives that deeply clarify pores, gently exfoliate dead skin and renew texture for smooth, soft and glowing skin.
details: DetailsBenefits3-in-1 Deep Pore Cleanser + Cell Renewal Exfoliant + Skin Brightening GlowDeep cleanser & skin brightenerKey Ingredients3% Glycolic acid clears pores to help reduce the appearance of blemishes, triggers production of collagen & hyaluronic acid to plump and moisturize skin while reducing look of wrinkles2% Citrus fruit acids - grape detoxes, lime exfoliates, orange and lemon brighten with antioxidant properties, apple balances oil & helps eliminate impurities from pores and exfoliate dead skin cellsAromatherapy essential oils: grapefruit, lavender, orange peel, eucalyptus leaf, peppermint & tangerine peelFormulated WithoutSulfatesPhthalatesParabensGlutenSynthetic fragrancesAlcoholItem 2571980How To UseUse 3-5 times per week.After cleansing skin with Nudeskin Gentle Hydra-Gel Face Cleanser, apply toner with fingers or cotton pad all over face to remove all traces of impurities and pat for ultimate glow. Follow with Nudeskin Citrus-C Mask and Daily Moisturizer.Allergy Alert: Contains alpha-hydroxy acids and aromatherapy from natural essential oils for holistic well-being. Citrus Peel Oils containing Limonene and Linalool may cause photosensitive reactions. Avoid direct sunlight or wear a sunscreen. Avoid eye areaIngredientsWater (Aqua), Propanediol, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycolic Acid, Sodium Citrate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Tricholoma Matsutake Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Hydrolyzed Cicer Seed Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Rhododendron Chrysanthum Leaf Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Litsea Cubeba Fruit Oil, Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Cymbopogon Citratus Leaf Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Cymbopogon Nardus (Citronella) Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Pogostemon Cablin Oil, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Tocopherol, *Citral, *Limonene.*Naturally occurring in essential oils listed.Nudestix formulations are updated from time to time as part of their commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. Therefore, ingredient lists or claims shown here may differ from the box of the product depending on time and global region of purchase.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: I would buy it again and again
reviews.comments: I would buy this amazing nudeskin glow toner again because it's work very good in my dry skin and gives me natural glow

reviews.headline: Too harsh, not for every day
reviews.comments: I purchased this because I needed to replace my previous toner that was discontinued. I should have read the "how to use" section before purchasing because I didn't realize that this is only meant to be used 3 to 5 times per week. The first time I used it with my nighttime skincare routine, my cheeks were very red and inflamed the next morning. About a week later, I decided to try it again. In addition to red cheeks, the irritation had spread to my nose and chin as well. I have never had sensitive skin, so I'm surprised that this irritated my skin so much. I think maybe this product is just too harsh for me.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: I use this with a cotton pad and it helps get any left over dirt or makeup that my cleanser didn't get. It does sting acne a bit so beware. I leave the residue on and use their moisturizer. Together, my skin feels so hydrated in the morning.

reviews.headline: No difference
reviews.comments: Did nothing for my skin. The pump also needs to be changed because it spits out excess liquid that just goes to waste. Only good thing about this is that it's great for sensitive skin as it didn't cause any irritation. Other than that, won't be purchasing again.

reviews.headline: Amazing toner!
reviews.comments: This toner does what it says! I have noticed A difference in my skin. It's brighter, softer, and my skin has less bumps! The first application made my skin slightly tingly but I had no reaction. I knew this was because I've never used a toner with acids in it. My skin is sensitive and this did not irritate my skin!

reviews.headline: Good chemical exfoliating toner
reviews.comments: This toner is really good for exfoliating skin quickly if you like chemical rather than physical exfoliation. As for the other review, I do think some of these ingredients aren't tolerated well by those with sensitive skin, but for people like me, with resistant skin, those ingredients can be very good. Skin care is not universal, so different people benefit from various combos of ingredients. This worked just fine for my oily, mature skin, and didn't break me out. It isn't for those with sensitive skin, though, as it is a bit too harsh. What I didn't like was the dispenser (push down on the top and it comes out.) When I would push down, it squirted out everywhere no matter how tightly I held the cotton pad to it. I would much rather have a pump or just pour it out myself.

reviews.headline: disappointing ingredients
reviews.comments: Grapefruit Oil, Lavender Oil, Orange Peel Oil, Eucalyptus Leaf Oil, Peppermint Oil, Tangerine Peel Oil are NOT skincare!!! These ingredients do nothing for you skin and only risk irritation.

media.headline: Gentle Resurfacing for Rough Skin Texture
Helped with my skin texture, will repurchase!
media.caption: I am in love with this toner! I have a collection of toners and definitely going to repurchase this one. I wanted to wait to use it before reviewing. I have combination textured skin with pores and this toner has helped so much! This toner doesn't dry out my skin, it's helps my skin texture especially on my cheeks. It's tightened my pores too! Also a huge plus (for me at least) is the bottle design. This is perfect to use with a cotton pad, less mess and honestly just looks so cute too.

media.headline: Smells good, does the skin good
media.caption: nudestix

faceoff_positive.comments:
Nudestix kindly gave me this toner for free so that I could review it. After a few weeks of use, twice a week in my PM routine on my face (T-zone area) and as a body exfoliant, my skin feels refreshed, clean, soft and it gives an instant glow. I like the pump dispenser, so that the toner can be used when it's still sitting upright on the vanity top. I apply the toner with cotton pads, but you can also pump it directly into your hands.

Since I have sensitive combo skin, I did feel stinging when I apply on my face, but not on other body areas. lt helps to clarify the pores, remove any dirt and resurface bumpy texture. However, I haven't noticed any major difference with my dark spots and pores size. Personally I don't really like a stinging sensation on my face, so this toner is better as a body exfoliant for me. Also, be mindful that this toner does contain essential oils, so I won't recommend if you are sensitive to EO oils.
faceoff_positive.headline: 3-in-1 Resurfacing AHA Toner

faceoff_negative.comments: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I tried it, and unfortunately was not a fan. It smelled like something someone much older would use. The product itself was light and absorbed into my skin easily. However, the dispenser was an absolute pain to use without cotton pads. I don't use cotton pads because I don't want to create unnecessary waste, and was surprised this brand that prides itself on a low environmental impact created this product in a way that promotes the generation of unnecessary waste. I also didn't see any improvement in my skin from regular use. I do use it for my underarms because the smell doesn't bother me as much, and it helps with staying sweat free. Unfortunately this product is not for me.
faceoff_negative.headline: So so product, didn't see results.
